verses.text: Swik'chaanh Jehová t'a masanil tiempo, swalnhej wach' lolonel t'ay.
Ha t'ay stzalaj in k'ool. Ab'ec ex anima emnaquil, tzalajanhec.
Alequel yab'ixal sb'inajnaquil Jehová wed'oc, junnhej scutej quik'anec chaanh.
Ix in awaj t'a Jehová, ix tak'wi t'ayin, ix yik'canel masanil in xivk'olal.
Ha heb' tz'ak'anoch Jehová yipoc sk'ool, stzetzon sat heb' yuj tzalajk'olal, malaj b'aj sq'uixwi heb'.
Ix wal in b'ha t'a Jehová, wach'chom te malaj welk'ochi, haxo ix ab'ani, ix in scolanel t'a masanil wilk'olal.
Ha heb' ay yelk'och Jehová t'a sat, a yángel tzoymaj t'a spatic yichanh heb', haxo scolchaj heb' chi' yuj.
Ak'lejec eyila', ol eyilani to te ay swach'k'olal Jehová. Te wach' yic heb' scol sb'ha t'a Jehová chi'.
Mach ex yiquex Jehová, ayocab' yelk'och t'a he sat. Malaj tas ol yak' palta t'a heb' ay yelk'och Dios t'ay.
Ha nok' choj, tz'el yip nok' yuj wejel, haxo pax heb' syak'em sb'ha t'a Jehová, malaj b'ak'uinh ol yak' palta junok tas wach' t'a heb'.
Ex unin, cotanhec, ab'ec tas swala', ol ex in k'ayb'ej yic tzeyak'och he pensar t'a Jehová.
Tato syal he k'ol snajatb'i he k 'inal, he gana pax tzalajk'olal tzek' junjun k'u eyuuj,
manhxo eyal chukal lolonel, manhxo eyesej.
Ik'equel he b'ha t'a chukal, manhxo eyak' owal, haxo wach'il tze k'ulej, tze b'eyb'alan junk'olal.
Ha Jehová stanhwan heb' anima wach' sb'eyb'al, smaclan wal yab'i ayic syalan sb'a heb' t'ay.
Ha Jehová, aycot yowal sk'ol t'a heb' sk'ulan chukal yic satel heb', yic manhxa mach ol naan heb'.
Syab' Jehová ayic syalan sb'a heb' anima wach' spensar t'ay, scolchajcanel heb' t'a masanil yilk'olal.
Ha Jehová ayek' t'a stz'ey heb' anima manhxo animaoc yet'nac syab'i, scolancanel heb' somchajel sk'ool yuj cuselal.
Ha heb' anima wach' spensar, wach'chom tzijtum tas tz'ik'an heb', haxo Jehová scolanel heb' t'a masanil juntzanh syaelal chi'.
A' stanhwan heb', malaj junok sb'aquil heb' ol q'uichajoc.
Axo pax heb' sk'ulan chukal jun, a yuj schucal heb' chi' ol chamoc. Ha heb' schichon sk'ol t'a heb' wach' sb'eyb'al, ol cotcan t'a yib'anh heb'.
Axo Jehová ol colan heb' schecab'. Ha heb' scol sb'a t'ay, manh ol cotcanlaj t'a yib'anh heb'.
